alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington County through 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Washington, or 22 miles northeast of Virgin River Gorge, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St George, Washington, Hurricane and Sand Hollow State Park. This includes Interstate 15 near mile marker 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
